text: Phir gar iss ki itlaa ho kay woh dono gawah kissi gunah kay murtakib huye hain to inn logon mein say jin kay muqablay mein gunah ka irtakaab hua tha woh do shaks jo sab mein qareeb tar hain jahan woh dono kharay huye thay yeh dono kharay hon phir dono Allah ki qasam khayen kay bil yaqeen humari yeh qasam inn dono ki uss qasam say ziyada raast hai aur hum ney zara tajawuz nahi kiya hum iss halat mein sakht zalim hongay
